turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to book a flight. Looking for a round trip from London to New York, departing on December 15th and returning on December 22nd.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. Searching for round trip flights from London (all airports) to New York (all airports) departing on December 15th and returning on December 22nd. Please wait a moment.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, these initial results are either ridiculously expensive or have 2+ stops and crazy long travel times. Can you find flights that are under £700 AND have only one stop? Is it even possible to get something decent for that price during December?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration.
